about_the_game:
This is Love Sucks:Night Three, the last part in your mission to get laid and not die doing it. When sexy monsters are out to kill you for their own mysterious goals, it's date or die! You've managed to both live and die through two nights, but as the girl's mysterious ritual reaches its deadline, and the lives of both you and the monsters are now on the line, do you have the spoons to break the spell, save your own life, and the monsters' souls?

Love Sucks is an adult Visual Novel, in which monster-kind has secretly integrated with humanity. Two monster girls, a vampire, and a succubus have chosen you to be their date this Halloween! But their motives go beyond just showing you a good time... With the involvement of magical artifacts, monster police, big boobs and a sweet rump, can you survive long enough to save not only yourself, but the monsters too? Of course, if you've played Night One and Night Two, you already know all of this! If you haven't, go back, you're gonna miss all the cool stuff that came before this!

Or maybe you'll just let it happen over, and over, because, screw it, the succ is good and there's worse ways to go!

content_descriptors.notes:

name: Love Sucks: Night Three

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Better than a Smart fridge
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Sound Card: Ideally you should have one
  • Additional Notes: It's a VN, my dude, they can run on pretty much anything

short_description: This is Love Sucks:Night Three, the third and final part in your mission to get laid and not die doing it. When sexy monsters are out to kill you for their own mysterious goals, it's date or die! So far you've manged to both live and die through two nights, but will you get out alive?
